objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Business/Corporate themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Business/Corporate narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Business/Corporate lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a corporate or business challenge involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a business context
Students engage in business themed role-play about daily routines and habits using formal register
Students create original business themed content about daily routines and habits in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Business/Corporate scenario?
What strategy or negotiation might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Business/Corporate story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Business/Corporate perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this business scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Business/Corporate situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using formal register in business context
Character B: Responding in formal register within business theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with strategy
daily routines and habits with negotiation
daily routines and habits with stakeholder

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Business/Corporate theme: Professional scenarios, workplace situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Business/Corporate themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
